QCAlgorithm provides a shortcut method, ABANDS(), for the AccelerationBands indicator. It creates an Indicator object, sets up a consolidator to update the indicator, and then returns the indicator so you can use it in your algorithm.

The following reference table describes the ABANDS method:

ABANDS()1/1

            AccelerationBands QuantConnect.Algorithm.QCAlgorithm.ABANDS (
    Symbol                       symbol,
    Int32                        period,
    *Decimal                     width,
    *MovingAverageType           movingAverageType,
    *Nullable<Resolution>  resolution,
    *Func<TradeBar>        selector
   )

Creates a new Acceleration Bands indicator.

Parameters
Symbol symbol The symbol whose Acceleration Bands we want.
Int32 period The period of the three moving average (middle, upper and lower band).
*Decimal width (Optional) A coefficient specifying the distance between the middle band and upper or lower bands.
*MovingAverageType movingAverageType (Optional) Type of the moving average. Options: ['Simple', 'Exponential', 'Wilders', 'LinearWeightedMovingAverage', 'DoubleExponential', 'TripleExponential', 'Triangular', 'T3', 'Kama', 'Hull', 'Alma']
*Nullable<Resolution> resolution (Optional) The resolution.
*Func<TradeBar> selector (Optional) Selects a value from the BaseData to send into the indicator, if None defaults to casting the input value to a TradeBar.

Return

AccelerationBands

Definition at line 46 of file Algorithm/QCAlgorithm.Indicators.cs.


The resolution of the indicator should be greater than or equal to the resolution of the security.

To retrieve the numerical value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AccelerationBands _abands;
// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_abands = ABANDS(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_abands.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _abands.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.abands = self.ABANDS(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.abands.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.abands.Current.Value
